Description:
ERP System Administrator ( Dynamics 365)Participates in projects to gather user requirements design, configure, test, and implement ERP systems and applications.
Conducting user training sessions on new applications or processes within the system.
Coordinate with vendors on technical support and licensing issues.
Collaborate with other departments to ensure smooth implementation of new features and upgrades.
Recommends new features or
Changes to configuration workflows based on user feedback.
Perform data backups and recovery.
Monitoring the performance of applications and systems to ensure optimal performance levels.
Providing support to users by answering questions about system usage and functionality.
Maintaining, troubleshooting, and resolving any ERP-related hardware, software, user access, or other problems.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field.
3-5 years’ experience administering and implementing an ERP system, preferably Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations.
Experience with SQL Server databases
gains exposure to some of the complex tasks within the job function.
Experience with reporting tools.
Experience with data migration and integration
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, Technical, Communication, Problem-solving, Organizational, Attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
